mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shuttle_common.sc_security_role(`name`,status,superior,`desc`) VALUES (#{name},#{status},0,#{desc}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status=#{status}, superior=0, `desc`=#{desc}, update_time=NOW()
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM shuttle_common.sc_security_role WHERE id=#{id} AND superior=0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shuttle_common.sc_security_role WHERE id=#{id} AND superior=0
SELECT id,`name`,pid AS p_id FROM shuttle_common.sc_security_resource
SELECT r.id FROM shuttle_common.sc_security_role_res rr JOIN shuttle_common.sc_security_resource r ON rr.resource_id=r.id WHERE rr.role_id=#{id}
